attributes.action: Stop the testing and farming of DOGs.
attributes.background:
A new puppy farm has been given the go-ahead in Britain.

https://metro.co.uk/2015/07/16/britain-just-approved-a-farm-that-breeds-puppies-for-animal-testing-5299201/

rejection.details:
We understand that you are concerned about the approval given to a puppy farm in 2016 but we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to make it illegal to carry out any research testing on dogs if that is something you would like to see happen.
